participant_id.Description: String value indicating unique identifier used to identify individuals for BIDs dataset.

treatment.Description: String value indicating housing condition treatment.SH indicates standard housing and EE indicates environmental enrichment housing.

sex.Description: String value indicating phenotypical sex. F indicates female, and M indicates male.

mouse_strain.Description: String value indicating inbred mouse strain. C58 indicates C58/J mice, and C57 indicates C57BL/6J mice.

RRB.Description: Number indicating total number of vertical jumps per night. This is a measure of repetitive motor behavior.
